```r
table_cluster <- bangladesh_gw %>% 
  select(SAMPLE_ID,
         Ba_mgL, 
         Ca_mgL, 
         Fe_mgL, 
         Mn_mgL,
         K__mgL, 
         Mg_mgL, 
         Na_mgL, 
         Si_mgL, 
         SO4_mgL, 
         Sr_mgL) %>% 
  
  drop_na() # need to drop any samples with NA values since can't cluster sites with missing data
```
